thumb.title: Grand Theft Auto VI / Vice City Pop 80s Part 1
thumb.description: ８０年代洋楽ポップ集です。グランド・セフト・オート６の為に厳選しました。全て過去のGTA作品のラジオで収録された事がない楽曲です。作業用BGMにでもどうぞ。楽曲リスト↓#0:00 Kim Wilde - You Keep Me Hangin’ On (1986)#4:18 Bananarama - Cruel Summer (1983)#7:46 Billy Ocean - Caribbean Queen (1984)#11:35 The B-52’s - Girl From Ipanema Goes To Greenland (1986)#15:32 Information Society - What's on Your Mind (1988)#20:12 Talking Heads - Once In A Lifetime (1981)#24:34 The Romantics - Talking In Your Sleep (1983)#28:35 Fox The Fox - Precious Little Diamond (1984)#32:33 Boys Don't Cry - I Wanna Be A Cowboy (1985)#38:42 George Michael - Monky (1988)#43:36 a-ha - Cry Wolf (1986)#47:45 Dan Hartman - We Are the Young (1984)#52:06 Exposé - Come Go With Me (1987)#56:26 Fine Young Cannibals - Ever Fallen Love (1986)Grand Theft Auto VI / Vice City Pop 80s Part 2→sm44975005
